name: extract-detection-utils
description: Pattern for extracting private detection/validation functions into centralized, reusable modules with optional caching
key_learnings: LRU cache and mocks don't mix - use cache_clear() in tests
Extract multiple related functions while refactoring (Maven, Gradle, npm, Poetry)
Follow existing module patterns for consistency (scylla/e2e/paths.py)
Pure functions with Path parameters are highly testable
Module-level functions preferred over classes for stateless utilities
